 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דֶּ֫מַע‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** (weeping, trickling) ==juice==, i.e. wine or (&amp;) oil (compare following) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דִּמְעֲךָ‎</span> [[Exod.22.28|Exod 22:28]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֵאָֽתְךָ‎</span>), compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = ***wine.***
